title: String scattering off the (2+1)-dimensional rotationg black hole
abstract: The $SL(2, R)/Z$ WZW orbifold describes the (2+1)-dimensional black hole which approaches anti-de~Sitter space asymptotically. We study the $1 \rightarrow 1$ tachyon scattering off the rotating black hole background and calculate the Hawking temperature using the Bogoliubov transformation.
